think_procedure: 1. Identify the knob being analyzed, which is 'autovacuum_max_workers'. 2. Understand the purpose of the knob, which controls the maximum number of autovacuum worker processes that can run at the same time. 3. Check if there are any special values associated with this knob. 4. In PostgreSQL, the value of 'autovacuum_max_workers' can be set to 0, which disables autovacuum. 5. Since 0 is a special value that alters the normal behavior of the knob, this indicates that it is a special knob. 6. Conclude that 'autovacuum_max_workers' is a special knob due to the presence of the special value 0.
